Package sweng.penelope.xml

Class CommonXML

java.lang.Object
sweng.penelope.xml.CommonXML
Direct Known Subclasses:
BirdXML, CampusesListXML, CampusXML
public class CommonXML extends Object
CommonXML is a class that provides and handles common aspects to all xml classes.
